I own several websites that are hosted on servers owned and maintained by MediaServe. Whenever I'd had an issue that I couldn't handle on my own, they've gone to whatever length was necessary to resolve the issue. Just two weeks ago, I had reason to move one site to a different server. They took care of it very quickly and smoothly.

Review.Titre: MediaServe is fine if you have a basic…
Review.Contenu: MediaServe is fine if you have a basic understanding of what you are doing. The price is certainly reasonable. There are many on site tools, but I never had the occasion to use them. Far more is available than my simple site requires. The couple of times I used customer service they were prompt and helpful.

Review.Titre: I have been extremely satisfied with the responsiveness of Troy and the Mediaserve team. They have quickly solved any and all issues we have had with our website.
Review.Contenu: Each time we have had difficulty with our website the Mediaserve team has be able to quickly resolve the issue and get our website back online.

Troy with Mediaserve goes above and beyond in his efforts to ensure the servers are top notch and running great. We have used Mediaserve for over 10 years and the customer service provided for our Church and ministry websites that Mediaserve hosts are absolutely wonderful. Several times Troy has assisted in fixing issues that wasn't even the web servers fault but was discovered to be something we overlooked in our coding. It's very hard to find customer service like this and we've been having it for over 10 years with Mediaserve. Very happy and would highly recommend!

Review.Titre: On Finding Media Serve: My 5 star review
Review.Contenu: For 20 years or more I have used GoDaddy and another hosting company for my several websites.  Over a year ago, I also began an internet radio broadcast.  While GoDaddy has always been great at customer service, the constantly increasing cost has been a concern.  Then I discovered Media Serve.  The customer service is great and even handled all the migration of my websites and domains.  They were up without an interruption of service.  The cost and value adds to the great service and I am already enjoying the great new relationship.

Review.Titre: Excellent support + clear and fair prices!
Review.Contenu: MediaServe = excellent support + clear and fair prices. It is a huge advantage to host your website on this excellent and small hosting. On MediaServe you are not "a number" when you ask for support, but a person.I became a MediaServe´s customer on 2012. Along these 10 years, monthly fee has remained the same. No price changes for a decade!

I have been using Mediaserve for over 15 years!! They are very quick to respond to any support requests, and have always resolved any issues right away. If you are a power user or webmaster or very techy person, you will definitely appreciate a great company like this!

Review.Titre: A true pleasure to work with
Review.Contenu: I have been working with Media Serve for years, and it has been one of the best experiences of any business relationship I have had. They are responsive to my needs and helpful with solving any issues, which are rare in the first place. They are a true pleasure to work with. I also like supporting and working with fellow Christians.

I been in charge of webhosting for our company for almost 20 years. We have now been using MediaServe for close to 15 years, and their service is fantastic. Quick response to all requests would get 10 stars if that was an option! I highly recommend them.

Review.Titre: Media Serve always takes care of my…
Review.Contenu: Media Serve always takes care of my issues quickly and courteously.  I've been a client for over 10 years.  Highly recommend them to anyone who is looking for hosting and domain management.

Review.Contenu: I was looking for a host who wouldn't try to censor or turn off a conservative website.  I have been very grateful for the excellent support I have received.  You go above and beyond and I recommend you to everyone.  Thank you for all that you do.

They took care of all the bumps in the road that they ran into and answered all my questions without saying “we can’t do that“. Everything‘s working great on the new platform! What a breath of fresh air.

Review.Titre: What Sets MediaServe.com Web Hosting Apart from The Rest
Review.Contenu: In the saturated market of web hosting services, finding one that stands out can be a challenge. After trying various providers, I discovered MediaServe.com and was immediately captivated by Troy's exceptional approach. Unlike other faceless companies focused solely on profit, Troy puts his customers' best interests at the forefront. Through his personalized service and genuine care, my initial client-provider relationship with MediaServe transformed into a dynamic and close connection with the person behind it all. It became evident that Troy's dedication extended beyond monetary gains as he consistently went above and beyond to assist clients in ways that surpassed expectations. This unique bond fostered an unparalleled sense of trust and mutual respect, creating an extraordinary experience that sets MediaServe apart from the competition.

Review.Contenu: The MediaServe team is responsive and helpful, as they always are. They made transferring my domain registrar to them as easy as possible. Thank you to the entire team for your stellar service.

Review.Titre: There are not nearly enough 'Stars' to…
Review.Contenu: There are not nearly enough 'Stars' to rate MidiaServe LLC!  Only five will not do!  The service, patience, care, follow-up, information, instruction has been phenomenal. A brief overview:I was in a situation where the host I was using was planned to shut down low end PHP sites in early 2022.  Mine was one of these.  My template was outdated and with my limited knowledge in this field I was forced to find another host. A different host was recommended by a friend and I initiated an account. They had a migration team which felt positive that they could do the transfer.  Some of the service I received was indeed good, however some had issues. I was chided more than once that I would need to get a developer involved which I knew I could not afford. I received a different person with nearly every correspondence so there was no consistency. At the end of nearly a 3+ week effort they were not able to complete the process. Ok, so now what?  I went back to my friend who then suggested MediaServe LLC. While initiating an inquiry relaying my tale of woe to Troy Leaver in MediaServe Technical Support I was quite surprised when he offered to first show me that they could get it transferred and running smoothly. I said 'Yes!' The same issue encountered with the previous host which they could not resolve was quickly remedied and now my site is up and safe.What can I can I say? The pressure is off. I thank the LORD Jesus Christ for answering many prayers and leading me here. I am very satisfied with the care and concern Troy had for the work I wanted to preserve on site to help others. He has also initiated a consult with John in Tech Support who is more familiar with my template for options on upgrading. This is in the offing. Thank you!
